talents.info_text:
Surround yourself with a shield that will absorb 80% of any physical or acidic attack, up to a maximum of 20, 31, 40, 48, 54 damage per attack. Deactivating the shield spikes it up to a temporary (five turns) 238, 413, 571, 719, 861 point shield.

Every time your shield absorbs damage, you convert some of the attack into energy, gaining two points of Psi, plus an additional point for every 30.6 points of damage absorbed, up to a maximum 2.4, 2.6, 2.9, 3.0, 3.2 points each turn. Spiked shields absorb energy more efficiently.

The shield strength increases with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Kinetic Shield

talents.info_text:
Surround yourself with a shield that will absorb 80% of any fire or cold attack, up to a maximum of 20, 31, 40, 48, 54 damage per attack. Deactivating the shield spikes it up to a temporary (five turns) 238, 413, 571, 719, 861 point shield.

Every time your shield absorbs damage, you convert some of the attack into energy, gaining two points of Psi, plus an additional point for every 30.6 points of damage absorbed, up to a maximum 2.4, 2.6, 2.9, 3.0, 3.2 points each turn. Spiked shields absorb energy more efficiently.

The shield strength increases with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Thermal Shield

talents.info_text:
Surround yourself with a shield that will absorb 80% of any lightning or blight attack, up to a maximum of 20, 31, 40, 48, 54 damage per attack. Deactivating the shield spikes it up to a temporary (five turns) 238, 413, 571, 719, 861 point shield.

Every time your shield absorbs damage, you convert some of the attack into energy, gaining two points of Psi, plus an additional point for every 30.6 points of damage absorbed, up to a maximum 2.4, 2.6, 2.9, 3.0, 3.2 points each turn. Spiked shields absorb energy more efficiently.

The shield strength increases with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Charged Shield

talents.info_text:
When activated, brings all shields off cooldown. Additional talent points spent in Absorption Mastery allow it to be used more frequently.

At level 3 and 6, your shields gain new elemental absorption:

  • Kinetic Shield: Nature at level 3, Temporal at level 6
  • Thermal Shield: Light at level 3, Arcane at level 6
  • Charged Shield: Darkness at level 3, Mind at level 6
talents.name: Absorption Mastery
talents.cooldown: <acronym class="variable" title="Values for levels 1-5, talent mastery 1.30">94, 76, 66, 60, 55</acronym>

name: absorption
description: Absorb damage and gain energy.
Use energy to move yourself and others.

talents.range: <acronym class="variable" title="Values for levels 1-5, talent mastery 1.30">3.0, 5.0, 6.0, 7.0, 7.0</acronym>
talents.name: Mindhook
talents.info_text:
Briefly extend your telekinetic reach to grab an enemy and haul them towards you.

Works on enemies up to 3, 5, 6, 7, 7 squares away. The cooldown decreases, and the range increases, with additional talent points spent.

This talent receives a reduced benefit from the Reach talent.
talents.cooldown: <acronym class="variable" title="Values for levels 1-5, talent mastery 1.30">17, 13, 12, 10, 10</acronym>

talents.info_text:
You encase your legs in precise sheathes of force, increasing your movement speed by 27%, 55%, 80%, 103%, 124% for 19 turns.

The duration improves with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Quick as Thought

talents.range: <acronym class="variable" title="Values for levels 1-5, talent mastery 1.30">3.0, 5.0, 6.0, 7.0, 7.0</acronym>
talents.name: Telekinetic Leap
talents.info_text:
You perform a precise, telekinetically-enhanced leap, landing up to 3, 5, 6, 7, 7 squares away.

This talent receives a reduced benefit from the Reach talent.

talents.range: <acronym class="variable" title="Values for levels 1-5, talent mastery 1.30">3.0, 5.0, 6.0, 7.0, 7.0</acronym>
talents.info_text:
You expend massive amounts of energy to launch yourself across 3, 5, 6, 7, 7 squares at incredible speed. All enemies in your path will be knocked flying and dealt between 282, 382, 460, 526, 584 and 423, 573, 690, 789, 876 damage. At talent level 5, you can batter through solid walls.

You must have a spiked Kinetic Shield erected in order to not get smashed to a pulp when using this ability. Shattering Charge automatically spikes your Kinetic Shield if available and not already spiked. If no such shield is available, you cannot use Shattering Charge.

This talent receives a reduced benefit from the Reach talent.
talents.name: Shattering Charge

name: augmented mobility
brainstorm
description: Focus your telekinetic powers in ways undreamed of by most mindslayers.

name: discharge

talents.info_text:
Unleash your subconscious on the world around you. While active, you fire up to 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 bolts each turn (one per hostile target) that deal 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 mind damage. Each bolt consumes 5 Feedback.

Feedback gains beyond your maximum allowed amount may generate extra bolts (one bolt per 18, 16, 15, 14, 14 excess Feedback per target), but no more then 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 extra bolts per turn.

This effect is a psionic channel, and will break if you move.

The damage will scale with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Mind Storm

talents.info_text:
Activate to invert your Feedback decay for 4, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns. This effect can be a critical hit, increasing the duration even further.

You must have some Feedback in order to start the loop.

The maximum Feedback gain will scale with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Feedback Loop
Backlash
talents.info_text:
Your subconscious now retaliates when you take damage. If the attacker is within range (7), you'll inflict mind damage equal to the Feedback gained from the attack or 49, 66, 79, 91, 101, whichever is lower.

This effect can only happen once per creature per turn.

The damage will scale with your Mindpower.

Focus your mind on a single target, diverting all offensive Discharge talent effects to it for 3, 5, 6, 7, 7 turns. While this effect is active, all Discharge talents gain 31%, 43%, 52%, 59%, 66% critical power.

If the target is killed, the effect will end early.

The damage bonus will scale with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Focused Wrath

description: Project feedback on the world around you.

name: distortion

talents.info_text:
Fire a bolt of distortion that ignores resistance and inflicts 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 physical damage. This damage will distort affected targets, decreasing physical resistance by 24% and rendering them vulnerable to distortion effects for two turns.

If the bolt comes in contact with a target that's already distorted, a detonation will occur, inflicting 150% of the base damage in a radius of 1, 1, 2, 2, 3.

Investing in this talent will increase the physical resistance reduction from all of your distortion effects.

At talent level 5, you learn to shape your distortion effects, preventing them from hitting you or your allies.

The damage will scale with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Distortion Bolt

talents.info_text:
Creates a distortion wave in a radius 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 cone that deals 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 physical damage and knocks back targets in the blast radius.

This damage will distort affected targets, decreasing physical resistance by 24% and rendering them vulnerable to distortion effects for two turns.

Investing in this talent will increase the physical resistance reduction from all of your distortion effects.

If the target is already distorted, they'll be stunned for 2, 2, 3, 4, 4 turns as well.

The damage will scale with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Distortion Wave

talents.info_text:
Ravages the target with distortion, inflicting 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 physical damage each turn for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns.

This damage will distort affected targets, decreasing physical resistance by 24% and rendering them vulnerable to distortion effects for two turns.

If the target is already distorted when Ravage is applied, the damage will be increased by 50% and the target will lose one beneficial physical effect or sustain each turn.

Investing in this talent will increase the physical resistance reduction from all of your distortion effects.

The damage will scale with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Ravage

talents.info_text:
Create a powerful maelstorm for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns. Each turn, the maelstrom will pull in targets within a radius of 2, 2, 3, 3, 4, and inflict 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 physical damage.

This damage will distort affected targets, decreasing physical resistance by 24% and rendering them vulnerable to distortion effects for two turns.

Investing in this talent will increase the physical resistance reduction from all of your distortion effects.

The damage will scale with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Maelstrom

description: Distort reality with your mental energy.

talents.info_text:
When an attack would deal 15% or more of your effective total health, you forge the Dream Shield to protect yourself, reducing the damage of all attacks of that type by 19, 25, 31, 35, 39 for the next 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 turn(s).

You may block multiple damage types at one time, but the base damage threshold increases by 15% per damage type the shield is already blocking.

If you block all of an attack's damage, the attacker will be vulnerable to a deadly counterstrike (a normal melee or ranged attack will instead deal 200% damage) for one turn.

At talent level 5, the block effect will last two turns.

This damage reduction scales with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Forge Shield

talents.info_text:
Release the bellows of the forge upon your surroundings, inflicting 33, 45, 54, 61, 68 mind damage, 33, 45, 54, 61, 68 burning damage, and knocking back your enemies in a radius 3, 4, 4, 5, 6 cone.

Empty terrain may be changed (50% chance) for 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns into forge walls, which block movement and inflict 3.00, 4.06, 4.88, 5.58, 6.20 mind and 3.00, 4.06, 4.88, 5.58, 6.20 fire damage on nearby enemies.

The damage and knockback chance will scale with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Forge Bellows
Forge Armor
talents.info_text:
Your Forge Shield talent now increases your Armour by 9, 12, 14, 17, 18, your Defense by 9, 12, 14, 17, 18, and gives you 5.99, 8.12, 9.77, 11, 12 psi when you're hit by a melee or ranged attack.

The bonuses will scale with your Mindpower.

The pounding forge of thought in your mind is released upon your surroundings. Each turn that you remain stationary, you'll strike the dreamforge, inflicting mind and burning damage on enemies around you.

The effect will build over five turns, until it reaches a maximum radius of 2, 2, 3, 3, 4, maximum mind damage of 9.50, 13, 16, 18, 20, and maximum burning damage of 9.50, 13, 16, 18, 20.

At this point you'll begin breaking the dreams of enemies who hear the forge, reducing their Mental Save by 15, 21, 25, 28, 32 and giving them a 15%, 19%, 22%, 24%, 26% chance of spell failure due to the tremendous echo in their minds for 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns.

Broken Dreams has a 6%, 14%, 20%, 25%, 30% chance to brainlock your enemies.

The damage and dream breaking effect will scale with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Dreamforge

name: Dream Forge
description: Master the dream forge to create powerful armor and effects.

name: Dream Smith

talents.info_text:
Smith a hammer from the dream forge and strike a nearby foe, inflicting 175%, 190%, 201%, 211%, 219% weapon damage. If the attack hits, it will bring one random Dream Smith talent off cooldown.

At talent level 5, you'll bring a second random talent off cooldown.

The base power, Accuracy, Armour penetration, and critical strike chance of the weapon will scale with your Mindpower.

Current Dream Hammer Stats

Base Power: 16.00 - 24.00

Uses Stats: 120% Wil

Damage Type: Physical

Accuracy is based on willpower for this weapon.

Accuracy Bonus: +0

Armour Penetration: +0

Physical Crit. Chance: +0
talents.name: Dream Smith's Hammer

talents.range: <acronym class="variable" title="Values for levels 1-5, talent mastery 1.30">6.0, 7.0, 9.0, 10.0, 11.0</acronym>
talents.info_text:
Throw your Dream Hammer at a distant location, inflicting 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% weapon damage on all targets between you and it. After reaching its destination, the Dream Hammer will return, potentially hitting targets a second time.

Learning this talent increases the Accuracy of your Dream Hammer by 13, 26, 39, 52, 65.
talents.name: Hammer Toss

talents.info_text:
Crush your enemy with your Dream Hammer, inflicting 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% weapon damage. If the attack hits, the target is stunned for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Stun chance improves with your Mindpower. Learning this talent increases your Physical Power for Dream Hammer damage calculations by 13, 26, 39, 52, 65 and all damage with Dream Hammer attacks by 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57%.
talents.name: Dream Crusher

talents.info_text:
Strike the target with a mighty blow from the forge, inflicting 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% weapon damage. If the attack hits, the echo of the attack will lash out at all enemies in a 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 radius.

Learning this talent adds 16, 22, 26, 30, 33 mind damage and 16, 22, 26, 30, 33 burning damage to your Dream Hammer strikes.

The mind and fire damage will scale with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Forge Echoes

description: Call the dream-forge hammer to smite your foes.

talents.info_text:
Puts targets in a radius of 1, 1, 2, 2, 2 to sleep for 3, 3, 4, 4, 4 turns, rendering them unable to act. Every 16, 22, 26, 29, 33 points of damage the target suffers will reduce the effect duration by one turn.

When Sleep ends, the target will suffer from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 20% sleep immunity for each turn of the Insomnia effect.

At talent level 5 Sleep will become contagious and has a 25% chance to spread to nearby targets each turn.

The damage threshold will scale with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Sleep

talents.info_text:
Slip into a lucid dream. While in this state, you are considered sleeping, but can still act, are immune to insomnia, inflict 15%, 21%, 25%, 28%, 32% more damage to targets under the effects of Insomnia, and your Physical, Mental, and Spell saves are increased by 15, 21, 25, 28, 32.

Note that being asleep may make you more vulnerable to certain effects (such as Inner Demons, Night Terror, and Waking Nightmare).

The saving throw bonuses scale with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Lucid Dreamer

talents.info_text: You move through the dream world, reappearing near the target location (6, 5, 4, 2, 1 teleport accuracy). If the target is a sleeping creature, you'll instead appear as close to them as possible.
talents.name: Dream Walk

talents.info_text:
Imprisons all sleeping targets within range in their dream state, effectively extending sleeping effects for as long as Dream Prison is maintainted.

This powerful effect constantly drains 4.35%, 3.70%, 3.05%, 2.40%, 1.75% of your maximum Psi per turn, and is considered a psionic channel; as such it will break if you move.

(Note that sleeping effects that happen each turn, such as Nightmare's damage and Sleep's contagion, will cease to function for the duration of the effect.)
talents.name: Dream Prison
talents.cooldown: <acronym class="variable" title="Values for levels 1-5, talent mastery 1.30">42, 34, 28, 24, 21</acronym>

name: dreaming
description: Manipulate the sleep cycles of yourself and your enemies.

talents.info_text:
Your Feedback decay now heals you for 0.9, 1.5, 2.1, 2.6, 3.0 times the loss, and the decay rate is reduced to 84%, 67%, 56%, 49%, 43% of the normal rate (up to 8.4%, 6.7%, 5.6%, 4.9%, 4.4% per turn). As a result, you are healed for 7.68%, 10%, 12%, 13%, 13% of your feedback pool each turn.

The healing effect improves with your Willpower.
talents.name: Biofeedback
Resonance Field
talents.info_text:
Activate to create a resonance field that will absorb 50% of all damage you take (328, 445, 535, 612, 680 max absorption). The field will not interfere with Feedback gain.

The max absorption value will scale with your Mindpower, and the effect lasts up to ten turns.

talents.name: Amplification
talents.info_text:
Increases your maximum Feedback by 10, 20, 30, 40, 50, and increases the Feedback you gain from damage by 18%, 31%, 42%, 52%, 61% (to 59%, 65%, 71%, 76%, 80% of damage received).

The Feedback gain will scale with your Mindpower.

Use Feedback to replenish yourself. This heals you for 319, 432, 520, 595, 661 life, and restores 31, 43, 52, 59, 66 stamina, 57, 77, 93, 107, 119 mana, 47, 64, 78, 89, 99 equilibrium, 31, 43, 52, 59, 66 vim, 15, 21, 26, 29, 33 positive and negative energies, 22, 30, 36, 41, 46 psi energy, and 7, 10, 13, 14, 16 hate.

The heal and resource gain will improve with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Conversion

name: feedback
description: Store feedback as you get damaged and use it to protect and heal your body.
Subtle applications of the psionic arts.
name: finer energy manipulations

talents.info_text:
Encase your body in a sheath of thought-quick forces, allowing you to control your body's movements directly without the inefficiency of dealing with crude mechanisms like nerves and muscles.

Increases Accuracy by 31, 40, 47, 54, 61 and critical strike chance by 16%, 20%, 24%, 27%, 31% for 6, 7, 8, 10, 11 turns.
talents.name: Perfect Control

talents.info_text:
Manipulate forces on the molecular level to realign, rebalance, and hone your weapon. Permanently increases the Accuracy and damage of any weapon by 14, 16, 18, 20, 22.

These values scale with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Reshape Weapon

talents.info_text:
Manipulate forces on the molecular level to realign, rebalance, and reinforce a piece of armour. Permanently increases the armour rating of any piece of Armour by 2, 3, 4, 4, 5, and permanently reduces the fatigue rating of any piece of armour by 4, 4, 5, 6, 6.

These values scale with your Willpower.
talents.name: Reshape Armour
Matter is Energy
talents.info_text:
Matter is energy, as any good Mindslayer knows. Unfortunately, the various bonds and particles involved are just too numerous and complex to make the conversion feasible in most cases. Fortunately, the organized, crystalline structure of gems makes it possible to transform a small percentage of its matter into usable energy.

Grants 24, 30, 35, 40, 46 energy per turn for between five and thirteen turns, depending on the quality of the gem used.

Focus energies on a distant target to lash it with physical force, doing 125, 146, 167, 187, 208 damage in addition to any Conduit damage.

Mindslayers do not do this sort of ranged attack naturally. The use of a telekinetically-wielded gem or mindstar as a focus will improve the effects considerably.
talents.name: Mindlash

talents.info_text:
Kinetically vibrate the essence of all foes within 5 squares, setting them ablaze. Does 155, 178, 201, 224, 247 damage over ten turns.

Mindslayers do not do this sort of ranged attack naturally. The use of a telekinetically-wielded gem or mindstar as a focus will improve the effects considerably.
talents.name: Pyrokinesis
Reach
talents.info_text: You can extend your mental reach beyond your natural limits using a telekinetically-wielded gemstone or mindstar as a focus. Increases the range of various abilities by 3.8%, 6.5%, 8.5%, 10%, 12% to 19%, 32%, 43%, 51%, 59%, depending on the quality of the gem used as a focus (currently 0.0%).

talents.name: Focused Channeling
talents.info_text: You can channel more energy with your auras and shields, using a telekinetically-wielded gemstone or mindstar as a focus. Increases the base strength of all auras and shields by 1.26, 1.47, 1.63, 1.77, 1.89 to 6.31, 7.36, 8.17, 8.85, 9.45, depending on the quality of the gem or mindstar used as a focus (currently 0.00).

name: focus
description: Use gems to focus your energies.

name: greater psi-fighting
description: Elevate psi-fighting prowess to epic levels.
Augment your telekinetic grip.

talents.name: Deflect Projectiles
talents.info_text:
You learn to devote a portion of your attention to mentally swatting, grabbing, or otherwise deflecting incoming projectiles.

All projectiles targeting you have a 20%, 31%, 39%, 45%, 51% chance to instead target a spot up to 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 grids nearby.

Bind the target in crushing bands of telekinetic force, immobilizing it for 5, 7, 8, 9, 10 turns. The duration will improve with your Mindpower.

The use of a telekinetically-wielded gem or mindstar as a focus will improve the effects of this talent considerably.
talents.name: Bind

talents.info_text:
Crush the target mercilessly with constant, bone-shattering pressure, slowing it by 50% for 3, 4, 5, 5, 6 turns and dealing 100, 111, 122, 134, 145 damage each turn.

The duration and damage will improve with your Mindpower.

The use of a telekinetically-wielded gem or mindstar as a focus will improve the effects of this talent considerably.
talents.name: Implode
Greater Telekinetic Grasp
talents.info_text:
Use finely controlled forces to augment both your flesh-and-blood grip, and your telekinetic grip. This does the following:

Increases disarm immunity by 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56%.

Allows 65%, 71%, 76%, 80%, 84% of Willpower and Cunning (instead of the usual 60%) to be substituted for Strength and Dexterity for the purposes of determining damage done by telekinetically-wielded weapons.

At talent level 5, telekinetically wielded gems and mindstars will be treated as one material level higher than they actually are.

name: grip
horror techniques

talents.info_text:
Summon a storm of swirling blades to slice your foes, inflicting 55, 75, 90, 103, 114 physical damage and bleeding to anyone who approaches for 8, 8, 9, 9, 9 turns.

The damage and duration will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Knife Storm

talents.info_text:
Pull all foes toward you in radius 5 while dealing 79, 107, 129, 148, 164 physical damage.

The damage will increase with your mindpower.
talents.name: Psionic Pull

talents.info_text:
Launches a knife with intense power doing 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 physical damage to all targets in line.

The damage will increase with Mindpower
talents.name: Razor Knife

description: Psionic talents of the various horrors of the world.
Increase mental capacity, endurance, and flexibility.
name: mental discipline

talents.name: Aura Discipline
talents.info_text:
Your expertise in the art of energy projection grows.

Aura cooldowns are all reduced by 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 turns. Aura damage drains energy more slowly (+3.20, +5.85, +8.18, +10, +12 damage required to lose a point of energy).

talents.name: Shield Discipline
talents.info_text: Your expertise in the art of energy absorption grows. Shield cooldowns are all reduced by 4, 7, 9, 10, 10 turns, the amount of damage absorption required to gain a point of energy is reduced by 3.8, 6.7, 8.7, 10, 11, and the maximum energy you can gain from each shield is increased by 0.7, 1.2, 1.7, 2.1, 2.4 per turn.

talents.name: Iron Will
talents.info_text: Improves Mental Saves by 6, 12, 18, 24, 30, and stun immunity by 20%, 34%, 43%, 50%, 56%.

talents.name: Highly Trained Mind
talents.info_text:
A life of the mind has had predictably good effects on your Willpower and Cunning.

Increases Willpower and Cunning by 2, 4, 6, 8, 10.

talents.name: Psychometry
talents.info_text:
Resonate with psionic, nature, and anti-magic powered objects you wear, increasing your physical and mind power by 0.50, 1.00, 1.50, 2.00, 2.50 or 50%, 50%, 50%, 51%, 61% of the object's material level (whichever is lower).

This effect stacks and applies for each qualifying object worn.

Clears your mind of current mental effects, and blocks additional ones over 6 turns. At most, 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 mental effects will be affected.

This talent takes no time to use.
talents.name: Mental Shielding
Projection
talents.info_text:
Activate to project your mind from your body for 6, 9, 12, 14, 16 turns. In this state you're invisible (+13, +17, +21, +24, +26 power), can see invisible and stealthed creatures (+26, +35, +42, +48, +53 detection power), can move through walls, and do not need air to survive.

All damage you suffer is shared with your physical body, and while in this form you may only deal damage to 'ghosts' or through an active mind link (mind damage only in the second case.)

To return to your body, simply release control of the projection.
talents.cooldown: <acronym class="variable" title="Values for levels 1-5, talent mastery 1.30">17, 14, 11, 10, 9</acronym>

talents.info_text:
Link minds with the target. While your minds are linked, you'll inflict 18%, 25%, 30%, 35%, 38% more mind damage to the target and gain telepathy for its creature type.

Only one mindlink can be maintained at a time, and the effect will break if the target dies or goes beyond range (14)).

The mind damage bonus will scale with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Mind Link
talents.cooldown: <acronym class="variable" title="Values for levels 1-5, talent mastery 1.30">37, 22, 15, 12, 10</acronym>

name: mentalism
description: Various mind based effects.

name: nightmare

talents.info_text:
Puts targets in a radius 7 cone into a nightmarish sleep for 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns, rendering them unable to act. Every 16, 22, 26, 29, 33 points of damage the target suffers will reduce the effect duration by one turn.

Each turn, they'll suffer 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 darkness damage. This damage will not reduce the duration of the effect.

When Nightmare ends, the target will suffer from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 20% sleep immunity for each turn of the Insomnia effect.

The damage threshold and mind damage will scale with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Nightmare

talents.info_text:
Brings the target's inner demons to the surface. Each turn, for 4, 7, 10, 12, 14 turns, there's a 19%, 24%, 27%, 30%, 32% chance that a demon will surface, requiring the target to make a Mental Save to keep it from manifesting.

If the target is sleeping, the chance to save will be halved, and fear immunity will be ignored. Otherwise, if the summoning is resisted, the effect will end early.

The summon chance will scale with your Mindpower and the demon's life will scale with the target's rank.
talents.name: Inner Demons

talents.info_text:
Inflicts 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 darkness damage each turn for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns, and has a 33%, 40%, 44%, 48%, 50% chance to randomly cause blindness, stun, or confusion (lasting 3 turns).

If the target is sleeping, the chance of avoiding a negative effect will be halved and fear immunity will be ignored.

The damage will scale with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Waking Nightmare

talents.info_text:
Increases your damage and resistance penetration on sleeping targets by 32%, 39%, 44%, 47%, 50%. Additionally, every time you slay a sleeping target, a Night Terror will be summoned for 2, 5, 8, 10, 12 turns.

The Night Terror's stats will scale with your Mindpower, as will the damage bonus to sleeping targets.
talents.name: Night Terror

description: Manifest your enemies nightmares.

name: other

talents.name: Telekinetic Grasp
talents.info_text: Encase a weapon or gem in mentally-controlled forces, holding it aloft and bringing it to bear with the power of your mind alone.

Allows you to wield a weapon telekinetically, directing it with your willpower and cunning rather than crude flesh. When activated, the telekinetically-wielded weapon will attack a random melee-range target each turn.

The telekinetically-wielded weapon uses Willpower in place of Strength and Cunning in place of Dexterity to determine attack and damage.

You are not telekinetically wielding anything right now.
talents.name: Beyond the Flesh

talents.info_text:
Forge a bowman, clad in leather armor, from your thoughts. The bowman learns Bow Mastery, Combat Accuracy, Steady Shot, Crippling Shot, and Rapid Shot as it levels up, and has +2 Strength, +5 Dexterity, and +2 Constitution.

Activating this talent will put all other thought-forms on cooldown.

The stat bonuses will improve with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Thought-Form: Bowman

talents.info_text:
Forge a warrior wielding a battle-axe from your thoughts. The warrior learns Weapon Mastery, Combat Accuracy, Berserker, Death Dance, and Rush as it levels up, and has +5 Strength, +2 Dexterity, and +2 Constitution.

Activating this talent will put all other thought-forms on cooldown.

The stat bonuses will improve with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Thought-Form: Warrior

talents.info_text:
Forge a defender wielding a sword and shield from your thoughts. The solider learns Armor Rraining, Weapon Mastery, Combat Accuracy, Shield Pummel, and Shield Wall as it levels up, and has +2 Strength, +2 Dexterity, and +5 Constitution.

Activating this talent will put all other thought-forms on cooldown.

The stat bonuses will improve with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Thought-Form: Defender

description: Various psionic talents.

name: possession
description: You have learnt to shed away your body, allowing you to possess any other.

talents.name: Kinetic Aura
talents.info_text:
Fills the air around you with reactive currents of force that do 31, 43, 52, 59, 66 physical damage to all who approach. All damage done by the aura will drain one point of energy per 10, 12, 13, 14, 16 points of damage dealt.

When deactivated, if you have at least 15 energy, a massive spike of kinetic energy is released as a range 6 beam, smashing targets for up to 319, 432, 520, 595, 661 physical damage and sending them flying. Telekinetically wielding a gem or mindstar will result in improved spike efficiency.

To turn off an aura without spiking it, deactivate it and target yourself. The damage will improve with your Mindpower.

talents.name: Thermal Aura
talents.info_text:
Fills the air around you with reactive currents of furnace-like heat that do 31, 43, 52, 59, 66 fire damage to all who approach. All damage done by the aura will drain one point of energy per 10, 12, 13, 14, 16 points of damage dealt.

When deactivated, if you have at least 20 energy, a massive spike of thermal energy is released as a conical blast (radius 6) of superheated air. Anybody caught in it will suffer up to 255, 346, 416, 476, 529 fire damage over several turns. Telekinetically wielding a gem or mindstar will result in improved spike efficiency.

To turn off an aura without spiking it, deactivate it and target yourself. The damage will improve with your Mindpower.

talents.name: Charged Aura
talents.info_text:
Fills the air around you with crackling energy, doing 31, 43, 52, 59, 66 lightning damage to all who stand nearby. All damage done by the aura will drain one point of energy per 10, 12, 13, 14, 16 points of damage dealt.

When deactivated, if you have at least 25 energy, a massive spike of electrical energy jumps between up to 1, 2, 2, 3, 4 nearby targets, doing up to 319, 432, 520, 595, 661 lightning damage to each. Telekinetically wielding a gem or mindstar will result in improved spike efficiency.

To turn off an aura without spiking it, deactivate it and target yourself.
When activated, brings all auras off cooldown. Additional talent points spent in Projection Mastery allow it to be used more frequently.
talents.name: Projection Mastery
talents.cooldown: <acronym class="variable" title="Values for levels 1-5, talent mastery 1.30">94, 76, 66, 60, 55</acronym>

name: projection
description: Project energy to damage foes.
Use your telekinetic powers to wield bows with deadly effectiveness.

talents.info_text: Fire and guide an arrow to its target with precise telekinetic nudges. Does normal damage, but accuracy and crit chance are increased by 43, 57, 70, 81, 92.
talents.name: Guided Shot

talents.info_text: Use telekinetic forces to greatly augment the durability and tension of your bow in order to fire an arrow with velocity unmatched by even the mightiest mundane archers. Increases armor penetration by 24, 39, 51, 61, 70, and deals 200%, 222%, 238%, 251%, 264% damage.
talents.name: Augmented Shot

talents.info_text: Ready and release an arrow with a flitting thought. This attack does not use a turn, and increases in talent level reduce its cooldown.
talents.name: Thought-quick Shot
talents.cooldown: <acronym class="variable" title="Values for levels 1-5, talent mastery 1.30">16, 13, 11, 8, 5</acronym>

talents.info_text:
You temporarily set aside a part of you mind to direct your telekinetically-wielded bow. It will automatically attack the nearest target each turn for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The telekinetically-wielded bow uses Willpower in place of Strength and Cunning in place of Dexterity to determine attack and damage.

You are not telekinetically wielding anything right now.
talents.name: Masterful Telekinetic Archery

name: psi-archery

talents.info_text: Gather your will, and brutally smash the target with your mainhand weapon, doing 241%, 266%, 285%, 302%, 316% weapon damage. If Conduit is active, it will extend to include your mainhand weapon for this attack. This attack uses your Willpower and Cunning instead of Strength and Dexterity to determine Accuracy and damage.
talents.name: Telekinetic Smash

talents.info_text:
While active, you give your flesh and blood body a boost in the form of precisely applied mental forces. Increases Strength and Dexterity by 9%, 15%, 21%, 25%, 29% of your Willpower and Cunning, respectively.

Strength increased by 9, 15, 21, 25, 29

Dexterity increased by 9, 15, 21, 25, 29
talents.name: Augmentation

talents.info_text:
When activated, turns off any active auras and uses your telekinetically wielded weapon as a conduit for the energies that were being channeled through those auras.

Any auras used by Conduit will not start to cool down until Conduit has been deactivated. The damage from each aura applied by Conduit is multiplied by 1.29, 1.60, 1.83, 2.03, 2.20, and does not drain energy.
talents.name: Conduit
Frenzied Psifighting
talents.info_text: Your telekinetically wielded weapon enters a frenzy for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns, striking up to 2, 2, 2, 3, 3 targets every turn.

name: psi-fighting
description: Wield melee weapons with mentally-manipulated forces.

name: Psychic Assault

talents.info_text:
Sends a telepathic attack, trying to destroy the brains of any target in the beam, doing 206, 279, 336, 384, 426 mind damage.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Mind Sear

talents.info_text:
Inflicts 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 mind damage and cripples the target's higher mental functions, reducing cunning by 15, 21, 26, 29, 33 and confusing (33%, 36%, 38%, 39%, 40% power) the target for 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns.

The damage, cunning penalty, and confusion power will scale with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Psychic Lobotomy

talents.info_text:
Sends out a blast of telepathic static in a 3, 4, 4, 5, 6 radius, inflicting 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 mind damage. This attack can brainlock affected targets.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Synaptic Static

talents.info_text:
Cripples the target's mind, inflicting 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 mind damage and reducing its Mental Save by 10, 13, 16, 18, 20 for 4 turns. This attack always hits, and the mental save reduction stacks.

Against brainlocked targets, the damage and Mental Save reduction will be doubled.

The damage and save reduction will scale with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Sunder Mind

description: Directly attack your opponents minds.

name: slumber

talents.info_text:
Puts the target into a deep sleep for 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns, rendering it unable to act. Every 66, 90, 108, 123, 137 points of damage the target suffers will reduce the effect duration by one turn.

When Slumber ends, the target will suffer from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 20% sleep immunity for each turn of the Insomnia effect.

The damage threshold will scale with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Slumber

talents.info_text:
Targets you have slept take 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 mind damage each turn for five turns upon waking.

The damage will scale with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Restless Night

talents.info_text:
Increases the amount of damage you can deal to sleeping targets before reducing the effect duration by 15%, 31%, 43%, 51%, 57%, and reduces the sleep immunity of your Insomnia effects by 3%, 6%, 8%, 10%, 11%.

These effects will be directly reflected in the appropriate talent descriptions.

The damage threshold bonus will scale with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Sandman

talents.info_text:
Enter a sleeping target's dreams for 7, 10, 12, 14, 15 turns. While in the Dreamscape, you'll encounter the target's invulnerable sleeping form as well as dream projections that it will spawn every other turn to defend its mind.

Projections inflict 50% less damage then the original, unless the target has Lucid Dreamer active.

When the Dreamscape ends, for each projection destroyed, the target's life will be reduced by 10% and it will be brainlocked for one turn.

In the Dreamscape, your damage will be improved by 65%, 89%, 107%, 122%, 136%.

The damage bonus will improve with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Dreamscape

description: Force enemies into a deep sleep.

name: solipsism

talents.name: Solipsism
talents.info_text:
You believe that your mind is the center of everything. Permanently increases the amount of psi you gain per level by 5 and reduces your life rating (affects life at level up) by 50% (one time only adjustment).

You also have learned to overcome damage with your mind alone, and convert 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56% of all damage you receive into Psi damage and 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56% of your healing and life regen now recovers Psi instead of life.

Converted Psi damage you take will be further reduced by 5.5%, 8.1%, 10%, 13%, 14% (2.4% from character level with the remainder further reduced by 3.2%, 5.8%, 8.2%, 10%, 12% from talent level).

The first talent point invested will also increase the amount of Psi you gain from Willpower by 0.5, but reduce the amount of life you gain from Constitution by 0.25.

The first talent point also increases your solipsism threshold by 20% (currently 0%), reducing your global speed by 1% for each percentage your current Psi falls below this threshold.

You now substitute 23%, 36%, 49%, 62%, 75% of your Mental Save for 23%, 36%, 49%, 62%, 75% of your Physical and Spell Saves throws (so at 100%, you would effectively use mental save for all saving throw rolls).

The first talent point invested will also increase the amount of Psi you gain from Willpower by 0.5, but reduce the amount of life you gain from Constitution by 0.25.

Learning this talent also increases your solipsism threshold by 10% (currently 0%).
talents.name: Balance

talents.info_text:
For every percent that your Psi pool exceeds 86%, 77%, 70%, 64%, 59%, you gain 1% global speed (up to a maximum of +13%, +22%, +29%, +35%, +40%).

The first talent point invested will also increase the amount of Psi you gain from Willpower by 0.5, but reduce the amount of life you gain from Constitution by 0.25 and will increase your solipsism threshold by 10% (currently 0%). Exceptional focus on this talent can suppress your solipsism threshold.
talents.name: Clarity
Dismissal
talents.info_text:
Each time you take damage, you roll 28%, 42%, 52%, 61%, 68% of your mental save against it. A successful saving throw can crit and will reduce the damage by at least 50%.

The first talent point invested will also increase the amount of Psi you gain from Willpower by 0.5, but reduce the amount of life you gain from Constitution by 0.25.

The first talent point also increases your solipsism threshold by 10% (currently 0%).

description: Nothing exists outside the minds ability to perceive it.

name: Thought-Forms

talents.name: Thought-Forms
talents.info_text:
Forge a guardian from your thoughts alone. Your guardian's primary stat will be improved by 31, 43, 52, 59, 66, its two secondary stats by 15, 21, 26, 29, 33, and it will have Magic, Cunning, and Willpower equal to your own.

At talent level one, you may forge a mighty bowman clad in leather armor; at level three a powerful warrior wielding a two-handed weapon; and at level five a strong defender using a sword and shield.

Thought forms can only be maintained up to a range of 10, and will rematerialize next to you if this range is exceeded.

Only one thought-form may be active at a time, and the stat bonuses will improve with your Mindpower.
Your thought-forms now know Lucid Dreamer, Biofeedback, and Psychometry at talent level 1, 2, 3, 5, 6.
talents.name: Transcendent Thought-Forms
Over Mind
talents.info_text:
Take direct control of your active thought-form, improving its damage, attack speed, and maximum life by 31%, 43%, 52%, 59%, 66%, but leaving your body a defenseless shell.

At talent level 1, any Feedback your Thought-Forms gain will be given to you as well. At level 3, your Thought-Forms gain a bonus to all saves equal to your Mental Save. At level 5, they gain a bonus to all damage equal to your bonus mind damage.

The secondary bonuses apply whether or not this talent is currently active.

The life, damage, and speed bonus will improve with your Mindpower.

You now gain 9%, 12%, 14%, 17%, 18% mind speed while Thought-Form: Bowman is active, 18, 25, 30, 35, 38 Mindpower while Thought-Form: Warrior is active, and 5%, 8%, 9%, 11%, 12% resist all while Thought-Form: Defender is active.

These bonuses scale with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Thought-Form Unity

description: Manifest your thoughts as psionic summons.

name: trance
description: Put your mind into a deep trance.
Pull energy from your surroundings.
name: voracity

talents.info_text:
You suck the kinetic energy out of your surroundings, slowing all targets in a radius of 2 by 21%, 28%, 34%, 41%, 47% for four turns.

For each target drained, you gain 15, 16, 18, 20, 22 Psi. The Psi gain will improve with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Kinetic Leech

talents.info_text: You leech the heat out of all targets in a radius of 1, freezing them for up to 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 turns. For each target drained, you gain 19, 21, 23, 26, 28 Psi. The Psi gain will improve with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Thermal Leech

talents.info_text: You pull electric potential from all targets around you in a radius of 2, giving them a nasty shock in the process. Deals between 61, 83, 100, 114, 127 and 184, 250, 300, 344, 382 damage, and has a chance to daze. For each target drained, you gain 23, 25, 28, 31, 34 Psi. The Psi gain and damage will improve with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Charge Leech
Insatiable
talents.info_text: Increases your maximum energy by 10, 20, 30, 40, 50.
